com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.exporter
Interface XMLExporter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BMLExporter
public interface XMLExporter
extends Extension

This interface defines the methods a document exporter should implement. An exporter is a java component that extends Xeena to enable it to export XML documents to any format. Any exporter should implement the XMLExporter interface and a constructor with an empty argument list. Warning: this class may not be compatible with future releases.

See Also:
XMLImporter
